# scoop-bucket

A bucket for scoop (<https://scoop.sh>)

## How do I install these manifests?

To add this bucket, run `scoop bucket add nais https://github.com/nais/scoop-bucket`. To install, do `scoop install <manifest>`.

## Development

Manifests are managed by the respective repositories that own the code.
Changes must be made in these repositories.

**Do not edit these files in this repository.**

Manifests are currently managed by:

- [nais/device](https://github.com/nais/device/tree/main/.github/workflows/templates)
- [nais/cli](https://github.com/nais/cli/tree/main/.github/workflows/templates)
